summary: The implementation addresses both requirements by fixing the logo image path in Navbar.tsx and HomePage.tsx to use the correct path '/assets/generated/reapers-asylum-logo.dim_400x400.png'. However, there is no evidence in the diff that the actual image file was regenerated or that build process changes were made to ensure the asset is properly deployed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify the image file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/reapers-asylum-logo.png
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows path corrections in components, but provides no evidence that the actual image file existence was verified or that it exists in the filesystem

missing_requirements.requirement: Regenerate the logo image file if missing and ensure it is properly copied to the public assets directory during the build process
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence in the diff of image file regeneration, addition of the image file to the repository, or build process modifications to handle generated assets

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the build process includes the generated assets in the deployment bundle
missing_requirements.reason: No build configuration files (vite.config.ts, package.json build scripts, etc.) were modified to ensure assets are included in deployment
